ygData.subject: Is a level of abstraction missing in evolutionary computing, particularly relating to neuroevolution and multitasking?
ygData.msgSnippet: We evolve populations of chromosomes, each of them representing a whole organism, whether the genotype maps 1-to-1 to a phenotype or it maps indirectly, as
